English: TYNWALD COURT
ST JOHN’S, 5th JULY, 1919.
ABSTRACTS
OF
ACTS FOR PROMULGATION
Clucas & Fargher, Printers, “Herald” Office, Ridgeway-street, Douglas.
ABSTRACTS OF ACTS OF TYNWALD
1.— THE INCOME TAX ACT, 1918
Manx: 1.— YN SLATTYS KEESH COSNEY-VLEEANAGH, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS HOGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to raise revenue by the imposition of Income tax.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy haglym argid liorish cur keesh er cosney-vleeanagh.

English: 2.— THE BREWERS ACT AMENDMENT ACT 1918.
Manx: 2.— YN SLATTYS IMLERYN (LHIASAGHEY), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS HOGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to increase the duties on beer, sugar, and malt.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy vooadaghey ny taillyn er lune, shugyr, as bry.

English: 3.— THE COMPANIES (FOREIGN INTERESTS) ACT, 1918.
Manx: 3.— YN SLATTYS SHESHAGHTYN (FOAYS JOARREEYN), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS HOGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to prohibit the alteration, except with the consent of the Governor, of the Articles of Association which restrict foreign interests in Companies.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy oardaghey noi caghlaa (er be lesh cordail yn Kiannoort) ny annaghyn y commeeys ta freayll fo howse yn foays dy yoarreeyn ayns sheshaghtyn.

English: 4.— THE COMPANIES (PARTICULARS AS TO DIRECTORS) ACT, 1918.
Manx: 4.— YN SLATTYS SHESHAGHTYN (NAIGHTYN MYCHIONE FIR-OIK), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS HOGHT-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to provide for the disclosure of certain particulars respecting the Directors of Companies.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail naightyn er-lheh dy ve er ny hoilshaghey mychione fir-oik sheshaghtyn.

English: 5.— THE REGISTRATION OF BUSINESS NAMES ACT, 1918
Manx: 5.— YN SLATTYS RECORTYS ENMYN KEIRDEE, NUY CHEEAD YEIG YEIG AS HOGHT-JEIG.

English: the object and purport of this act are to provide for the registration of persons carrying on business under business names.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy dy chiarail sleih ve recortit ta cur rish keirdyn fo enmyn keirdee.

English: The Royal Assent to the five preceeding ACTS was given by his Majesty in Council at the Court at Buckingham Palace, on the 2nd  day of August, 1918.
Manx: Va’n choardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ee yn Plaase Buckingham er

English: 6.— THE ATTORNEYS ACT, 1919.
Manx: 6.— YN SLATTYS TURNEYRYN, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to enable the Governor to reduce the number of years required to be served by law students in the case of a person who has served in the Army, navy or Air Force during the present war.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n Kiannoort dy leodaghey traa yn chirveish prindeisyn ’s’y leigh da quoi-erbee t’er hirveish myr sidoor, shiolteyr, ny dooinney-getlagh ayns yn chaggey shoh.

English: 7.— THE DOUGLAS MUNICIPAL CORPORATION (HONORARY FREEDOM OF THE BOROUGH) ACT, 1919.
Manx: 7.— YN SLATTYS CO-CHORP GHOOLISH (SEYRSNYS ONNOROIL Y CO-CHORP) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to enable the Municipal Corporation of Douglas to confer the honorary freedom of the Borough on persons of distinction.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur pooar da’n co-chorp Ghoolish dy ghiootal seyrsnys onnoroil yn Co-chorp er peiaghyn toilchinagh.

English: 8.— THE GREAT ENQUEST ABOLITION ACT, 1919.
Manx: 8.— YN SLATTYS JERREY YN VING VOOAR, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to to abolish the Great Enquest.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur lesh gys jerrey yn Ving Vooar.

English: 9.— THE ADULTERATION ACT, 1919.
Manx: 9.— YN SLATTYS MHILLY, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the Adulteration Act, 1912, as to the strength of spirits.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Mhilley nuy cheead yeig as ghaa-yeig choud as ta bentyn rish yn niart spyrrydyn.

English: 10.— THE WILLS (SOLDIERS AND SAILORS) ACT, 1919.
Manx: 10.— YN SLATTYS CHYMMAGHYN (SIDOORYN AS SHIOLTEYRYN), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the law with respect to testamentary dispositions by soldiers and sailors.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn rish chymmaghyn jeant liorish sidooryn as shiolteyryn.

English: 11.— THE TYNWALD COURT ADJOURNMENTS ACT, 1919.
Manx: 11.— YN SLATTYS  NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to provide for the adjournment of the Tynwald Court.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail son arraghey yn Quaiyl Keeil-Eoin.

English: 12.— THE TRUSTEE ACT, 1919.
Manx: 12.— YN SLATTYS FIR-HREISHTEE, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the law with respect to the investment of trust funds.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn rish cur magh er use argid-hreishtee.

English: 13. THE DESTRUCTIVE INSECTS AND PESTS ACT, 1919.
Manx: 13.— YN SLATTYS CARCHUILLAGYN AS BEISHTYN MHILTAGH NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to prevent the introduction and spreading of insects and pests destructive to crops, trees, and bushes.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiettal veih gaase as bishaghey carchuillagyn as beishtyn ta jannoo jeel er troayryn biljyn as thammagyn.

English: 14.— THE WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION ACT, 1919.
Manx: 14.— YN SLATTYS COOILLEENEY OBBREEYN NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to provide compensations for workmen for injury sustained in the course of their employment.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail son cooilleeney obbreeys son gortyn er ny gheddyn ayns nyn obbyr.

English: 15.— THE HOUSE OF KEYS ELECTION ACT, 1919.
Manx: 15.— YN SLATTYS REIHYS JEH’N KIARE AS FEED NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the House of Keys Election Acts as to the persons entitled to vote.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey ny Slattysyn Reihys jeh’n Kiare-as-Feed bentyn rish sleih ta cair oc dy heih.

English: 16. THE EDUCATION (AMENDMENT) ACT, 1919.
Manx: 16. YN SLATTYS YNSAGH (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to continue certain grants for education.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur reesht giootyn erlheh son ynsagh.

English: 17.— THE BREWERS ACT, 1919.
Manx: 17. YN SLATTYS IMLERYN NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to increase the duties on beer, malt, and sugar.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy vooadaghey ny taillyn er lune, shugyr, as bry.

English: 18.— THE EDUCATION ENDOWMENTS AMENDMENT ACT, 1919.
Manx: 18.— YN SLATTYS LEGGADYN YNSAGH (LHIASAGHEY) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the Education Endowments Act, 1907, by enlarging the powers of the Council of Education.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Leggadyn Ynsagh nuy cheead yeig as shiaght liorish sheeyney-magh pooaraghyn yn Coonceil Ynsagh.

English: 19..— THE CIVIL REGISTRATION (BIRTHS AND DEATHS) AMENDMENT ACT, 1919.
Manx: 19.— YN SLATTYS RECORTYS Y THEAY (RUGGYRYN AS BAASEYN) LHIASAGHEY NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS NUY-JEIG.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the Civil Registration Acts as to the notification of deaths and in other respects.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey ny Slattysyn Recoertys y Theay bentyn rish cur fys jeh baaseyn as ayns oyryn elley.

English: The Royal Assent to the fourteen last preceeding Acts was given by his Majesty in Council at the Court at Buckingham Palace, on the 25th  day of June, 1919.
Manx: Va’n choardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ee yn Plaase Buckingham er queig-as-feedoo laa jeh’n cheyoo vee nuy cheead yeig as nuy jeig.
